verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] issuing an order to ban transgender people from serving in the military except under " limited circumstances , " following up on his calls to ban transgender individuals from serving .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: issuing] [ARG1: an order to ban transgender people from serving in the military except under " limited circumstances , " following up on his calls to ban transgender individuals from serving] .

President Donald Trump is issuing an order to [V: ban] [ARG1: transgender people] [ARG2: from serving in the military] [ARGM-LOC: except under " limited circumstances] , " following up on his calls to ban transgender individuals from serving .

President Donald Trump is issuing an order to ban [ARG0: transgender people] from [V: serving] [ARG1: in the military] except under " limited circumstances , " following up on his calls to ban transgender individuals from serving .

President Donald Trump is issuing an order to ban transgender people from serving in the military except under " limited circumstances , " [V: following] up [ARG1: on his calls to ban transgender individuals from serving] .

President Donald Trump is issuing an order to ban transgender people from serving in the military except under " limited circumstances , " following up on his calls to [V: ban] [ARG1: transgender individuals] [ARG2: from serving] .

President Donald Trump is issuing an order to ban transgender people from serving in the military except under " limited circumstances , " following up on his calls to ban [ARG0: transgender individuals] from [V: serving] .
